description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Intense top-down shooter with a magnetic twist!  Defend four missiles as they head towards their intended target.   Use a magnetic field to keep enemy projectiles away from the missiles.  Also includes a 2-player mode.  Created by a UNM Advanced Graphics Lab student.
description.short: Intense top-down shooter with a magnetic twist!  Defend four missiles as they head towards their intended target.   Use a magnetic field to keep enemy projectiles away from the missiles.  Also includes a 2-player mode.  Created by a UNM Advanced Graphics Lab student.
